item.title: Flask-Based Twitter Clone with Live Chatting
item.description: This project is a web-based social media and chat application built using Flask, a Python web framework, and Flask-SocketIO for real-time communications. It provides a platform for users to sign in, create and view tweets, and engage in live chat sessions. The application integrates social media functionalities with real-time chat capabilities to offer a comprehensive user experience. Key Features User Authentication: Supports user sign-in and sign-up with credential verification and account creation.

item.title: Trapping Rain Water
item.description: Given n non-negative integers representing an elevation map where the width of each bar is 1, compute how much water it can trap after raining. Example 1: Input: height = [0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1] Output: 6 Explanation: The above elevation map (black section) is represented by the array [0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1]. In this case, 6 units of rainwater (blue section) are being trapped. Solution in Python class Solution: def trap(self, height: List[int]) -> int: maxright = 0 maxleft = 0 capacity = 0 l, r = 0, len(height) - 1 while l <= r: if maxleft < maxright: amount = maxleft - height[l] if amount > 0: capacity += amount maxleft = max(height[l], maxleft) l += 1 else: amount = maxright - height[r] if amount > 0: capacity += amount maxright = max(maxright, height[r]) r -= 1 return capacity Explanation of Solution

item.title: Pac-Dude: A Processing-Based Arcade Game
item.description: “Pac-Dude” is a dynamic reimagining of the classic Pac-Man game, developed using the Processing language. This project not only offers a nostalgic arcade experience but also incorporates advanced programming concepts, including sophisticated pathfinding algorithms and state management for the ghost characters. Key Features Enhanced Gameplay Mechanics: Combines traditional Pac-Man gameplay with new challenges and dynamic difficulty scaling. Custom Map Generation: Algorithmically generated maps provide a unique experience in each game session.

item.title: Musically - A Music Analysis Application for Song Lovers!
item.description: This web application, designed for music lovers, integrates various functionalities including user authentication, music data access through the Spotify API, and a unique feature for lyric generation using Markov chains. Features User Authentication Login/Signup: Users can create an account or log in to access personalized features. Logout: Session-based logout functionality for security. Profile Management: Options for users to view and edit their profile, including password changes. Music Data Integration Spotify API Usage: Fetches data from Spotify for artist and song information.

Hey! I’m Eric. I’m currently a freshman at Stony Brook University studying Computer Science and Applied Mathematics. Things I like: puns puzzles plants mammals Things I don’t like: cephalopods mushroom camel-case socks Things that occupy my time: derping teaching tricks to my rabbits trying to understand the world While you’re here, feel free to check out my projects. I am also very into competitive programming and math so check out the math and cs pages for fun problems I solved.
